column1: '''''The Journal of Inklings Studies''''' is the journal of The Oxford University C.S. Lewis Society
column3: The Owen Barfield Literary Estate and The G.K. Chesterton Library.

column1: ''The Journal of Inklings Studies'' provides a forum for rigorous academic engagement with the thought of C.S. Lewis
column5: and their intellectual and literary peers and forebears.

column2: it seeks to contribute to the reception of these thinkers in theology
column5: both in the UK and worldwide.
